sentences.text: NOTICE OF 2017 ANNUAL MEETING AND PROXY STATEMENT
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Message to Stockholders
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: March 1, 2017
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Dear Fellow Stockholder:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: I am pleased to invite you to attend Teradata Corporations 2017 Annual Meeting of Stockholders on April 19, 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The meeting will begin promptly at 8:00 a.m. local time at the Waldorf Astoria Chicago, 11 East Walton Street, Chicago, Illinois 60611.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This proxy statement, which includes a notice of the 2017 annual meeting, tells you more about the agenda and procedures for the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: It also describes how our Board of Directors operates and gives information about director candidates and general compensation and corporate governance matters.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Since last years annual meeting, Teradata continued its business transformation process and took a number of significant actions to increase shareholder value, principally the development and initial implementation of our new strategic direction as announced at our Analyst Day on November 17, 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: During 2016, Teradata made great strides in developing and implementing key steps of our business transformation, including: refocusing the Companys strategy away from simply selling technology to information technology buyers and toward delivering business value to business users as a trusted advisor; expanding our core data warehouse market opportunity by making it easier for customers to buy our solutions and by providing Teradata data warehousing in the public cloud; and transitioning from perpetual to subscription-based Teradata database licenses, which will result in a more predictable, recurring revenue stream for the company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, as described on page 37 of this proxy statement, stockholder engagement has always been an important part of Teradatas business practices, and we greatly value the input we receive from our investors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We are in frequent communication with stockholders on a variety of matters, including operations, corporate governance practices and executive compensation and have designed our executive compensation program in a way that addresses the input provided through our stockholder outreach efforts.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: During 2016, we continued to modify our executive compensation program to address common themes expressed by our investors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: These changes connect pay and performance more closely than ever and enhance the alignment of our executive compensation program with your long-term interests.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board of Directors continues to evolve, and we remain committed to ensuring that it includes a highly qualified and diverse group of directors who are well-equipped to oversee the success of Teradatas business and effectively represent your interests.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Just recently, we added two directors who bring new technological and business growth expertise to the board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We encourage you to review the qualifications, skills and experience that we have identified as important attributes for each of our directors as described beginning on page 6 of this proxy statement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Victor Lund, Teradatas new President and Chief Executive Officer, and I look forward to seeing you at the annual meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you plan to attend, please send an email to investor.relations@teradata.com to receive a meeting reservation request form.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, you are welcome to share your thoughts or concerns with us on any topic.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Communications can be addressed to directors in care of the Corporate Secretary, Laura Nyquist, at 10000 Innovation Drive, Dayton, Ohio 45342 or by email at the address listed above.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Every vote is important.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Whether or not you plan to attend the annual meeting, I urge you to authorize your proxy as soon as possible so that your stock may be represented at the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We value your support and thank you for your commitment to Teradata.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Sincerely,
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: James M. Ringler Chairman of the Board
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: TERADATA CORPORATION
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: NOTICE OF ANNUAL MEETING OF STOCKHOLDERS
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: TIME
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 8:00 a.m. local time
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: DATE
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Wednesday, April 19, 2017
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: PLACE
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Waldorf Astoria Chicago 11 East Walton Street, Chicago, Illinois 60611
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: PURPOSE
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Elect Ms. Cooper and Messrs. Fishback, Kepler and Stavropoulos to serve as Class I directors for three-year terms expiring at the 2020 annual meeting of stockholders and to hold office until their respective successors are duly elected and qualified;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Advisory (non-binding) vote to approve executive compensation (a say-on-pay vote);
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Advisory (non-binding) vote on the frequency of say-on-pay votes;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Vote on the ratification of the appointment of our independent registered public accounting firm for 2017; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Transact such other business as may properly come before the meeting and any adjournment or postponement of the meeting by or at the direction of the Board of Directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: OTHER IMPORTANT INFORMATION
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Record holders of Teradata common stock at the close of business on February 22, 2017, may vote at the meeting
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Your shares cannot be voted unless they are represented by proxy or in person by the record holder at the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Even if you plan to attend the meeting, please submit a proxy to ensure that your shares are represented at the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: INTERNET AVAILABILITY
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Important Notice Regarding the Availability of Proxy Materials for the 2017 Annual Meeting of Stockholders to Be Held on April 19, 2017: This notice of the 2017 annual meeting of stockholders and proxy statement, our 2016 annual report, and form of proxy and voting instruction card are available at http://www.proxyvote.com.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: By order of the Board of Directors,
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Laura Nyquist General Counsel and Secretary
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: March 1, 2017
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 10000 Innovation Drive  Dayton, OH 45342
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: PROXY STATEMENT
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: General Information
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: On behalf of the Board of Directors of Teradata Corporation, a Delaware corporation (Teradata, the Company, we or us), we are requesting your proxy for the 2017 annual meeting of stockholders and any adjournments or postponements that follow.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The meeting will be held at 8:00 a.m. local time, on April 19, 2017, at the Waldorf Astoria Chicago, 11 East Walton Street, Chicago, Illinois 60611.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: At the meeting, we will: (1) consider the election of Ms. Cooper and Messrs. Fishback, Kepler and Stavropoulos as Class I directors for three-year terms expiring in 2020; (2) vote on an advisory (non-binding) basis to approve executive compensation as disclosed in this proxy statement (a say-on-pay vote); (3) vote on an advisory (non-binding) basis to approve the frequency of say-on-pay votes; (4) vote on the ratification of the appointment of our independent registered public accounting firm for 2017; and (5) transact such other business as may properly come before the meeting and any adjournment or postponement thereof.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This proxy statement contains information about the 2017 annual meeting, as well as information regarding the voting process, director elections, our corporate governance programs, and executive and director compensation, among other things.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We are furnishing this proxy statement together with our 2016 annual report and form of proxy and voting instruction card (proxy card).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Proxy materials for the 2017 annual meeting of stockholders are being made available in printed form on or about March 13, and they will be available online on or about March 14, 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: YOUR VOTE IS IMPORTANT!
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Whether or not you plan to attend the annual meeting, please vote your shares as soon as possible by phone, Internet, or mail if you are receiving paper proxy materials.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: By using the Internet or phone voting methods, you help us reduce costs and respect the environment.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Both are fast, convenient, and environmentally-friendly.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you are a stockholder of record (i.e., you directly hold your common stock through an account with our transfer agent, Computershare Investor Services), you can vote your shares using one of the following three methods.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you are a beneficial owner (i.e., you indirectly hold your common stock through a nominee such as a bank or broker), you can vote your shares using the methods provided by your nominee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: VOTE BY INTERNET   http://www.proxyvote.com   Use the Internet to transmit your voting instructions and for electronic delivery of information.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: VOTE BY PHONE   1-800-690-6903   Use any touch-tone telephone to transmit your voting instructions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: VOTE BY MAIL   Vote Processing, c/o Broadridge, 51 Mercedes Way, Edgewood, NY 11717   If you receive paper proxy materials, mark, sign and date your proxy card and return it in the postage-paid envelope we have provided or return it to the address shown above.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Who may vote at the meeting?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Only stockholders of record may vote at the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A stockholder of record is a stockholder as of the close of business on February 22, 2017, the record date for the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: On the record date, there were 130,887,589 shares of common stock outstanding.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: How many votes do I have?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For each share of common stock you own, you are entitled to cast one vote on each director candidate submitted for election and to cast one vote on each other matter properly brought before the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: When will I receive my proxy materials?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Proxy materials for the 2017 annual meeting of stockholders are being made available in printed form on or about March 13.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: They will be available online on or about March 14.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: How do I access my proxy materials?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Notice and Access.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Proxy materials (including our 2016 annual report, notice of the 2017 annual meeting of stockholders and proxy statement, and proxy card) are being made available via the Internet pursuant to the notice and access rules of the Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A Notice of Internet Availability of Proxy Materials (Notice) is being mailed to most of our record and beneficial stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Notice includes instructions on how to access the proxy materials on the Internet or request printed copies of these materials.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To receive future proxy materials by mail or email, follow the instructions included with the Notice.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you previously elected to receive materials via mail or email delivery, you will not receive the Notice, but you will receive your materials via the delivery method you requested.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Electronic Delivery.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: At their request, many stockholders are receiving an email providing them with links to receive the Notice and Internet access to the proxy materials rather than receiving a printed copy of the Notice or printed proxy materials.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Paper Copies.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you have previously requested paper copies of your proxy materials, or are otherwise required to receive paper copies, you will receive the 2017 proxy materials, including notice of the meeting, in printed form unless you consent to receive these documents electronically in the future.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: How do I receive my proxy materials electronically?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you are a stockholder of record (i.e., you directly own your common stock through an account with our transfer agent, Computershare Investor Services), you can choose to access your Teradata proxy materials electronically and save the cost of producing and mailing a Notice and other documents by following the instructions provided at http://www.investordelivery.com or by following the prompt if you choose to authorize your proxy over the Internet.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You must provide your sixteen-digit control number listed on your Notice or proxy card to make this election.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Your election to receive proxy materials by electronic access will remain in effect until you revoke your consent at http://www.proxyvote.com, or your consent is deemed to be revoked under applicable law.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You must provide your sixteen- digit control number to revoke your consent.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you are a beneficial owner (i.e., you indirectly hold your common stock through a nominee such as a bank or broker), please review the information provided by your nominee for instructions on how to elect to view future proxy statements and annual reports over the Internet.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: How do I obtain a separate set of proxy materials?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To save costs, only one set of proxy materials is being printed and mailed to stockholders who have requested printed copies and share an address, unless otherwise requested or required under applicable law.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you have multiple Teradata common stock record accounts and/or share an address with a family member who is a Teradata stockholder and want to receive more than one copy of the Notice and/or proxy materials, you may contact our mailing agent, Broadridge Financial Solutions, at Broadridge Householding Department, 51 Mercedes Way, Edgewood, New York, 11717 (phone: 1-800-542-1061).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Broadridge will mail you a separate copy of the proxy materials and will remove you from the householding program within thirty days after receipt of this request.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: How can I vote my shares of Teradata stock?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Your vote is important.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Your shares can be voted at the annual meeting only if you are a record stockholder and present in person or represented by proxy.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Even if you plan to attend the meeting, we urge you to authorize your proxy in advance.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You may vote your shares by authorizing a proxy over the Internet or by telephone.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, if you received paper copies of the proxy materials by mail, you can also submit a proxy by mail by following the instructions on the proxy card.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Voting your shares by authorizing a proxy over the Internet, by telephone or by written proxy card will ensure your representation at the annual meeting regardless of whether you attend in person.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you are a stockholder of record, please authorize your proxy electronically by going to the http://www.proxyvote.com website or by calling the toll-free number (for residents of the United States and Canada) listed on your Notice and proxy card.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Please have your Notice or proxy card in hand when going online or calling.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you authorize your proxy via the Internet, you do not need to return your proxy card.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you choose to authorize your proxy by mail, simply mark your proxy card, and then date, sign and return it in the postage-paid envelope provided.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you hold your shares beneficially through a nominee (such as a bank or broker), you may be able to authorize your proxy by telephone or the Internet as well as by mail.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You should follow the instructions you receive from your nominee to vote these shares.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: How do I revoke my proxy for the annual meeting?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You may revoke your proxy at any time before it is voted at the meeting by
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: properly executing and delivering a later-dated proxy (including a telephone or Internet proxy authorization);
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: voting by ballot at the meeting; or
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: sending a written notice of revocation to the inspectors of election in care of our Corporate Secretary at Teradata Corporation, 10000 Innovation Drive, Dayton, Ohio 45342.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: What if I want to vote in person at the meeting?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The method by which you vote and authorize your proxy will in no way limit your voting rights if you later decide to vote n person at the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you beneficially own your shares through a nominee (such as a bank or broker), you must obtain a proxy executed in your favor from your nominee to be able to vote at the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: What are the requirements for ensuring that my shares are voted by proxy at the meeting?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Your shares will be voted at the meeting as directed by the instructions on your proxy card, voting instructions or electronic proxy if (1) you are entitled to vote, (2) your proxy was properly executed or properly exercised electronically, (3) we received your proxy prior to the voting deadlines for the annual
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: meeting (April 18, 2017 at 11:59 p.m. for record stockholders who do not vote at the meeting, such time as directed by the nominee for beneficial owners, and April 14, 2017 for participants in our 401(k) savings plan), and (4) you did not revoke your proxy prior to or at the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: How do I vote the shares I hold in the Teradata 401(k) savings plan?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you are a participant in the Teradata 401(k) savings plan, your proxy includes the number of Teradata common stock units (share interests) allocated to your plan account.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You may instruct the trustee how to vote the number of share interests allocated to your plan account.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The trustee will vote the share interests allocated to your plan account in accordance with your instructions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you do not vote your share interests in the Teradata 401(k) savings plan, the trustee will vote the unallocated share interests, as well as any allocated share interests held by the plan, in the same proportion as the share interests for which it received timely voting instructions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: What is considered a quorum to conduct the annual meeting?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To have a quorum necessary to conduct business at the meeting, it is necessary to have shares that represent (in person or by proxy) the holders of a majority of our shares of common stock outstanding on the record date, which is the close of business on February 22, 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Shares of common stock represented in person or by proxy (including shares that abstain with respect to a particular proposal to be voted upon and broker non-votes) will be counted as present for the purpose of determining whether a quorum exists at the meeting for that proposal.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If a quorum is not present, the meeting will be adjourned until a quorum is obtained.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: How many votes are required to approve each item?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: With respect to Proposal 1 (the election of directors), the affirmative vote of a majority of the voting power present (in person or by proxy) at the meeting and entitled to vote on the election of directors is required to elect each director.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: With respect to Proposal 2 (the advisory say-on-pay vote on executive compensation), the affirmative vote of a majority of the voting power present (in person or by proxy) at the meeting and entitled to vote on such question is required to adopt this advisory resolution in accordance with Teradatas bylaws.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: However, the results of this vote are not binding on the board, whether or not any resolution is passed under this voting standard.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: With respect to Proposal 3 (the frequency of the advisory say-on-pay vote on executive compensation), the voting option (e.g., 1 year, 2 years or 3 years), if any, that receives the affirmative vote of a majority of the voting power present (in person or by proxy) at the meeting and entitled to vote on this item of business will be the option adopted by the stockholders in accordance with the voting standard established in Teradatas bylaws.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Like the say-on-pay vote, the results of this vote are not binding on the board, whether or not any option is passed under this voting standard.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: With respect to Proposal 4 (the ratification of the appointment of the Companys independent auditors), the affirmative vote of a majority of the voting power present (in person or by proxy) at the meeting and entitled to vote on such item of business is required to ratify the appointment.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Abstentions effectively count as votes against the adoption of a proposal and the election of a director.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Moreover, if you do not instruct your nominee (such as your bank or broker) how to vote your shares with respect to the election of directors, the advisory vote on executive compensation, and the advisory vote on the frequency of votes on executive compensation, the nominee may not vote on these proposals.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: However, broker non-votes will have no effect on the outcome of the vote for any proposal or the election of any director.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Broker non-votes occur when a nominee returns a properly executed proxy but does not vote on a particular item because the nominee has not received voting instructions from the beneficial owner and, therefore, does not have the authority to vote on a proposal.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: How does the Board recommend that I vote my shares?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Teradata Board of Directors recommends that you vote:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: FOR the election of each of the four Class I director nominees, Ms. Cooper and Messrs. Fishback, Kepler and Stavropoulos (see page 6);
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: FOR the approval, on an advisory basis, of the compensation of our named executive officers as disclosed in this proxy statement (see page 73);
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: FOR the approval, on an advisory basis, of a frequency of once every year for future advisory say-on-pay votes on executive compensation (see page 75); and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: FOR ratification of the appointment of PricewaterhouseCoopers LLP as our independent registered public accounting firm for 2017 (see page 76).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you submit your proxy without specific voting instructions, your shares represented by that proxy will be voted as recommended by our board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As discussed above, if you hold your shares beneficially through a nominee (such as a bank or a broker) and fail to provide specific voting instructions to that nominee, your shares will not be voted in the election of directors, the advisory say-on-pay vote on executive compensation, or the advisory vote on the frequency of future advisory say-on-pay votes on executive compensation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: What do I need to do if I want to attend the annual meeting?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you plan to attend the meeting in person, please send an email to us at investor.relations@teradata.com to request a meeting reservation request form.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You may attend the meeting if you are a stockholder of record, hold a proxy for a stockholder of record, or are a beneficial owner of our common stock with evidence of ownership.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you are a beneficial owner (i.e., you hold your common stock through a nominee such as a bank or broker), please include evidence of your ownership of common stock with the form (such as an account statement showing you own Teradata common stock as of the record date).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you do not have a reservation for the meeting, you may still attend if we can verify your stock ownership at the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We will include the results of the votes taken at the meeting, as well as the frequency with which the Company intends to conduct the say-on-pay vote in light of the results of the advisory frequency vote, in a Form 8-K filed with the SEC within four business days after the date of the annual meeting or any adjournment or postponement thereof.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You may also find information on how to obtain a transcript of the meeting by writing to our Corporate Secretary at Teradata Corporation, 10000 Innovation Drive, Dayton, Ohio 45342.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: ELECTION OF DIRECTORS (Item 1 on Proxy Card)
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board of Directors is currently divided into three classes.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Directors are elected by stockholders for terms of three years and hold office until their successors are elected and qualified.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: One of the three classes is elected each year to succeed the directors whose terms are expiring.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As of the 2017 annual meeting, the terms for the directors in Classes I, II and III of the Board of Directors expire in 2017, 2018 and 2019, respectively.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Ms. Cooper and Messrs. Fishback, Kepler and Stavropoulos currently are Class I directors whose terms are expiring at the 2017 annual meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For the reasons described below, each of the Class I directors has been nominated by the board for re-election through the 2020 annual meeting of stockholders and until his or her successor is elected and qualified.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Proxies solicited by the board will be voted for the election of the nominees, unless you provide a contrary instruction on your proxy.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Director Qualifications
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board of Directors currently consists of eleven members who we believe are well-qualified to serve on the board and represent our stockholders best interests.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As described below under the caption Selection of Nominees for Directors, he board and its Committee on Directors and Governance (the Governance Committee) select nominees with a view to establishing a Board of Directors that is comprised of members who:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: have extensive business leadership experience,
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: bring diverse perspectives to the board,
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: are independent and collegial,
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: have high ethical standards as well as sound business judgment and acumen, and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: understand and are willing to make the time commitment necessary for the board to effectively fulfill its responsibilities.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We believe that each of the director nominees and other directors bring these qualifications to our Board of Directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Moreover, they provide our board with a diverse complement of specific business skills, experience and perspectives, including: extensive financial and accounting expertise, public-company board experience, knowledge of the technology and software industries and of Teradatas business, experience with companies with a global presence and growth strategies, and extensive operational and strategic planning experience.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, the board believes that each of the director nominees and other directors has demonstrated outstanding achievement in his or her professional career, the willingness to participate actively in board activities and share policy-making and strategic thinking experiences, an ability to articulate independent perspectives, make analytical inquiries and take tough positions that challenge management, and a high degree of personal and professional integrity.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The following describes the key qualifications, business skills, experience and perspectives that each of our directors brings to the Board of Directors, in addition to the general qualifications described above and information included in the biographical summaries provided below for each director.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Based on all of these qualifications and attributes, the board believes that the directors and nominees have the appropriate set of skills to serve as members of the board.

sentences.text: ADDITIONAL INFORMATION CONCERNING THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board of Directors oversees the overall performance of the Company on your behalf.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Members of the board stay informed of our business by actively participating in numerous board and committee meetings, through discussions with the Chief Executive Officer (CEO) and other members of management and staff, and by reviewing other materials and communications provided to them.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Corporate Governance
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board of Directors is elected by the stockholders to govern our business and affairs.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The board selects the senior management team, which is charged with conducting our business.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Having selected the senior management team, the board acts as an advisor to senior management and monitors its performance.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The board reviews our strategies, financial objectives, operating plans, major risks, and plans for mitigating such risks.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: It also plans for management succession of the CEO, as well as other senior management positions, and oversees our compliance efforts.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To support these important duties, the board employs a strong framework of corporate governance practices, including those outlined below:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Stockholder Outreach
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Stockholder engagement is an important part of our business practices, and we greatly value the input we receive from our stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Teradata Investor Relations and members of Teradata management are in frequent communication with stockholders on a variety of matters, including strategy, operations, corporate governance practices, and executive compensation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In November 2016, the Company hosted an Analyst Day for investors at which the management team directly engaged with stockholders regarding Teradatas business transformation, including the Companys strategic and financial plans.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: From time to time, independent members of the board also engage with stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In 2015 and 2016, at the direction of the board, Teradata engaged in a robust stockholder outreach effort to better understand and address any concerns stockholders might have relating to the Companys executive compensation program.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition to compensation-related matters, a number of corporate governance matters were discussed with our stockholders during the outreach process.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As described below on page 37 of the Compensation Discussion and Analysis section of this proxy statement, this engagement has been very productive and informative and, accordingly, stockholder interests have been taken into consideration in establishing a number of meaningful changes to Teradatas executive compensation program.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Corporate Governance Guidelines
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To help discharge its responsibilities, the Board of Directors has adopted Corporate Governance Guidelines on significant corporate governance issues.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: These guidelines address, among other things, such matters as director ndependence, committee membership and structure, meetings and executive sessions, and director selection, retirement, and training.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The boards Corporate Governance Guidelines, which were updated in November 2016, are found on our corporate governance website at http://www.teradata.com/governance-guidelines.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The boards independent directors meet regularly in executive session without management present and, as provided in the Corporate Governance Guidelines, the Board of Directors has selected the Chairman of the Board, who is an independent director, to preside at its executive sessions during 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Board Independence and Related Transactions
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We believe that the Company benefits from having a strong and independent board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For a director to be considered ndependent, the board must determine that the director does not have any direct or indirect material relationship with the Company that would affect his or her exercise of independent judgment.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board of Directors has established ndependence standards as part of its Corporate Governance Guidelines.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In general, the board must determine whether a director is considered independent, taking into account the independence guidelines of the New York Stock Exchange (NYSE) and the factors listed immediately following this paragraph (which are included as Exhibit B, Director Independence Standards, to the boards Corporate Governance Guidelines referenced above) in addition to those other factors it may deem relevant.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: No director may qualify as independent unless the board affirmatively determines
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (i) under the NYSE listing standards, that he or she has no material relationship with us (either directly or as a partner, stockholder or officer of an organization that has a relationship with us), and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ii) under our independence standards, that the director or director candidate does not have any direct or indirect material relationship with us.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our independence standards include the following minimum criteria:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 1. A director will not be independent if:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (i) at any time during the last three years, he or she has been an employee of Teradata, or an immediate family member of the director has been an executive officer of Teradata;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ii) he or she has received, or has an immediate family member who has received, during any 12-month period within the last three years, more than $120,000 in direct compensation from Teradata, other than certain limited circumstances, including:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (a) compensation and other fees paid for service as a director; or
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (b) compensation received by an immediate family member for service as an employee of Teradata (other than as an executive officer);
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (iii) he or she has certain relationships with any firm that serves as Teradatas internal or external auditor, including
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (a) the director is a current partner or employee of such firm;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (b) the director has an immediate family member who is a current partner of such firm;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (c) the director has an immediate family member who is a current employee of such firm and personally works on Teradatas audit; or
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (d) the director or an immediate family member of the director was within the last three years a partner or employee of such a firm and personally worked on Teradatas audit within that time;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (iv) at any time within the past three years, the director or his or her immediate family member has been employed as an executive officer of another company where any of Teradatas present executive officers at the same time serves or served on that companys compensation committee; or
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (v) he or she is a current employee, or an immediate family member of the director is a current executive officer of a company that has made payments to, or received payments from, Teradata for property or services in an amount which, in any of the last three fiscal years, exceeds the greater of $1 million, or 2% of such other companys consolidated gross revenues (in each case, as reported in the other companys last completed fiscal year).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 2. A director will not be independent if he or she is an employee, or any member of the directors immediate family is an executive officer, of a company which is indebted to Teradata or to which Teradata is indebted, and the total amount of the indebtedness exceeds the greater of $1,000,000 or 2% of the consolidated annual gross revenues of either company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 3. A director will not be independent if he or she or any member of the directors immediate family is an officer, director or trustee of a charitable or other tax-exempt organization, and donations by Teradata during any single fiscal year to the charitable or other tax-exempt organization within the last three years exceeds the greater of $1,000,000 or 2% of the organizations consolidated annual gross revenues.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 4. A relationship arising solely from a directors interest in another company or similar entity that is party to a transaction with Teradata will not be considered to be a material relationship with Teradata that would impair the directors independence if:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (i) such interest arises only from:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (a) the directors position as a director, trustee or similar position of such other company or entity, and/or
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (b) the direct or indirect ownership by the director and the directors immediate family members, in the aggregate, is less than 10% of the equity or similar ownership interest in such other company or entity; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ii) the director is not involved in the negotiation of the terms of the transaction with Teradata and does not receive any special benefits as the result of the transaction.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The boards independence standards also provide for additional criteria for members of the Audit and Compensation and Human Resource Committees as required under applicable NYSE rules.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board of Directors has affirmatively determined that all of our non-employee directors and nominees, namely Mses.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Bacus and Cooper, and Messrs. Chou, Fishback, Fu, Gianoni, Kepler, Ringler, Schwarz, and Stavropoulos, meet the NYSE isting independence standards and our independence standards for the board and the committees on which they serve.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In making this
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: determination, the board considered transactions in 2015 and 2016 pursuant to which Cigna and its affiliate purchased data warehouse and marketing applications products and related services from Teradata, and Teradata purchased employee benefit program services, with aggregate sales attributed to such purchases significantly below 2% of the annual revenues of either company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The board concluded that Ms. Bacus relationship as an officer of Cigna does not disqualify her from being deemed independent under these standards.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: There were no other transactions, relationships or arrangements in fiscal year 2016 that required review by the board for purposes of determining director independence.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Board Leadership Structure
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: While our Corporate Governance Guidelines do not require that our Chairman and CEO positions be separate, our board believes that having separate positions and having an independent director serve as Chairman is the appropriate eadership structure for us at this time and demonstrates our commitment to good corporate governance.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our board is led by an independent Chairman, Mr. Ringler.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our CEO, Mr. Lund, is the only member of the board who is not an independent director.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We believe that this leadership structure enhances the accountability of the CEO to the board, strengthens the boards independence from management and benefits independent risk oversight of the Companys day-to-day risk management activities.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, separating these roles allows Mr. Lund to focus his efforts on running our business and managing the Company in the best interests of our stockholders, while we are able to benefit from Mr. Ringlers prior experience as a chairman of other public company boards.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Board Oversight of Risk
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Management is responsible for the Companys day-to-day risk management activities, and our boards role is to engage n informed risk oversight.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In fulfilling this oversight role, our Board of Directors focuses on understanding the nature of our enterprise risks, including our operations and strategic direction, as well as the adequacy of our risk management process and overall risk management system.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The boards committee structure and the collective knowledge and experience of its members promotes a broad perspective, open dialogue and useful insights regarding risk, thereby increasing the effectiveness of the boards role in risk oversight.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: There are a number of ways our board performs this function, including the ollowing:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: at its regularly scheduled meetings, the board receives management updates on our business operations, financial results, and strategy and discusses risks related to the business;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: the Audit Committee assists the board in its oversight of risk management by overseeing the Companys enterprise risk management process and discussing with management  particularly, the Chief Financial Officer, Vice President, Enterprise Risk and Assurance Services, Chief Ethics, Compliance & Privacy Officer, and Director, Corporate Security  the Companys guidelines and policies regarding financial and enterprise risk management and risk appetite, including:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (i) major risk exposures such as, for example, financial, cybersecurity, data privacy, business continuity, and legal and regulatory risks, and the steps management has taken to monitor and control such exposures; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ii) internal audit and ethics and compliance updates, as well as whistleblower updates, if any; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: through management updates and committee reports, the board monitors our risk management activities, including the enterprise risk management process, risks relating to our compensation programs, and financial and operational risks being managed by the Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Compensation Risk Assessment
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Based on an analysis conducted by management and reviewed by the Board of Directors, we do not believe that our compensation programs for employees are reasonably likely to have a material adverse effect on the Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Executive Management Succession Planning
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In consultation with its Compensation and Human Resource Committee and CEO, the Board of Directors regularly reviews short- and long-term succession plans for all senior management positions and, in particular, our CEO.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The criteria used when assessing the qualifications of potential CEO successors include, among others, strategic vision and leadership, continuity of our culture, operational excellence, financial management, executive officer leadership skills, ability to motivate employees, as well as an ability to develop an effective working relationship with the board and engender the confidence of our stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our current CEO, management team and Board of Directors are committed to overseeing a robust succession plan for the Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To that end, we are identifying and developing a team of capable, willing and enthusiastic internal CEO and senior management candidates through increased responsibilities, additional opportunities to engage with investors and our board, as well as outside development education and other similar leadership enhancement activities.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Code of Ethics
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We have a Code of Conduct that sets the standard for ethics and compliance for all of our employees, including our officers, directors, chief accounting officer, and corporate controller.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Code of Conduct is available on our corporate governance website at http://www.teradata.com/code-of-conduct.

sentences.text: Selection of Nominees for Directors
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board of Directors and the Governance Committee are responsible for recommending candidates for membership to the board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The director selection process and director qualification guidelines are described in detail in the boards Corporate Governance Guidelines, which are posted on our corporate governance website at http://www.teradata.com/governance-guidelines.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In determining candidates for nomination, the Governance Committee will seek the input of the Chairman of the Board and the CEO and will consider individuals recommended for board membership by our stockholders in accordance with our bylaws and applicable law.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In general, we desire to have a balanced group of directors that can perpetuate the Companys long-term success and represent stockholder interests generally through the exercise of sound business judgment using its diversity of experiences and perspectives.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As part of the selection process, the board and the Governance Committee use the qualification factors listed in our Corporate Governance Guidelines and examine candidates business skills and experience, personal integrity, judgment, and ability to devote the appropriate amount of time and energy to serving the best interests of stockholders, in addition to the objectives and desired
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: composition of the board as a whole and the Companys current and future needs.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Although we do not have a formal diversity policy, the Governance Committee and the board also consider the desire for diverse perspectives that can be gained through different professional experiences, backgrounds, and education, as well as gender, race or ethnic diversity.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As described under the caption Director Qualifications on pages 6 to 7 of this proxy statement, we believe our directors have very diverse perspectives, business skills, experience, and backgrounds.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Stockholders wishing to recommend individuals for consideration as directors should submit their suggestions in writing to the Corporate Secretary of the Company in accordance with the provisions of our bylaws which require the recommending stockholder to provide, among other things, the candidates name, age, residential and business contact information, detailed biographical data and qualifications for service as a board member, the class or series and number of shares of Teradatas capital stock (if any) which are owned beneficially or of record by the candidate, a document signed by the candidate indicating the candidates willingness to serve, if elected, and evidence of the stockholders ownership of our stock.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Recommendations by stockholders that are made in this manner will be evaluated in the same manner as other candidates.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Stockholders who intend to nominate directors for election at our next annual meeting of stockholders must follow the procedures described in our bylaws, which are available on our corporate governance website at http://www.teradata.com/articles-and-bylaws.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: See Procedures for Stockholder Proposals and Nominations on page 81 of this proxy statement for further details regarding how to nominate directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The directors nominated by the Board of Directors for election at the 2017 annual meeting were recommended by each of the members of Governance Committee following the process described above.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: See Director Qualifications and Nominees on pages 6 through 9 of this proxy statement for further details regarding the reasons and director attributes supporting these nominations.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All of these candidates for election are currently serving as our directors and have been determined by the board to be independent.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Under the boards Corporate Governance Guidelines, if any director who is nominated for election at the 2017 annual meeting is not re-elected by the required majority vote, such director is required to promptly offer his or her resignation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board of Directors, giving due consideration to the best interests of the Company and our stockholders, is required to evaluate the relevant facts and circumstances, including whether the underlying cause of the directors failure to receive the required majority vote can be cured, and make a decision on whether to accept the offered resignation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Any director who offers a resignation pursuant to this provision cannot participate in the boards decision process.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board of Directors will promptly disclose publicly its decision and, if applicable, the reasons for rejecting the offered resignation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If the board accepts a directors resignation pursuant to this process, the Governance Committee will recommend to the Board of Directors whether to fill the resulting vacancy or reduce the size of the board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: COMMITTEES OF THE BOARD
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Committee Structure and Responsibilities
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board of Directors has four committees: the Audit Committee, the Compensation and Human Resource Committee, the Committee on Directors and Governance, and the Executive Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Audit Committee: The Audit Committee is the principal agent of the Board of Directors in overseeing our accounting and inancial reporting processes and audits of our financial statements and internal controls, including assisting in the boards oversight of
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (i) the integrity of our financial statements,
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ii) our compliance with ethical, legal and regulatory requirements,
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: iii) the qualifications, independence and performance of our independent registered public accounting firm, and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (iv) the qualifications and performance of our internal audit function and internal auditors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee also:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: is directly responsible for the appointment, compensation, retention, and oversight of our independent registered public accounting firm and pre-approving all audit services, as well as any audit-related, tax and other non-audit services, to be performed by such firm;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: oversees the negotiation of audit fees in connection with the retention of our independent registered public accounting firm;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: reviews and discusses with our independent registered public accounting firm its quality control procedure
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: regularly reviews the annual audit plan of our independent registered public accounting firm, including the scope of audit activities, and monitors the progress and results of the annual audit;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: meets with the independent registered public accounting firm, the internal auditors and management to review and discuss the internal audit scope and plan, the results of internal audit activities, and the adequacy of our internal controls and financial, accounting and reporting processes;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: oversees the appointment, removal, performance, and compensation of our chief audit executive;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: discusses with management and the independent registered public accounting firm our annual audited financial statements and unaudited quarterly financial statements, and recommends to the board that the audited financial statements be included in the Companys annual report filing with the SEC;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: discusses with management and the independent registered public accounting firm
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (i) all critical accounting policies and practices used,
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ii) any significant financial reporting issues and judgments made in connection with the preparation of our financial statements, including analyses of the effects of alternative accounting methods under generally accepted accounting principles that have been discussed with management and the treatment preferred by the independent registered public accounting firm,
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (iii) the effect of regulatory and accounting initiatives and off-balance sheet structures on our financial statements, and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (iv) any other reports required by law to be delivered by the independent registered public accounting firm, including any management letter or schedule of unadjusted differences;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: is directly responsible for oversight of our major financial and enterprise risk exposures such as, for example, financial, cybersecurity, information technology (IT), data privacy, business continuity, and legal and regulatory risks, and regularly discusses managements plans related to these areas;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: receives periodic reports from our internal auditors on findings of fraud, if any, and its significant findings regarding the design and/or operation of internal control over financial reporting as well as management responses to such findings;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: reviews our periodic SEC filings and our quarterly earnings releases;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: oversees our ethics and compliance program;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: prepares the committee report required pursuant to the rules of the SEC for inclusion in our proxy statements;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: ensures that the Company has established procedures for the confidential submission of employee concerns regarding accounting or auditing matters, as required by The Sarbanes-Oxley Act of 2002; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: reviews relationships between the Company and our independent registered public accounting firm or any of its subsidiaries to ascertain the independence of the external auditors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee has three members, Ms. Cooper and Messrs. Fu and Kepler, each of whom meets the NYSE isting independence standards, is independent under our recently-updated independence standards and financially literate, as determined by the board under applicable NYSE standards.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, the board has determined that because of their accounting and financial management expertise, two out of three of the members of the Audit Committee, including the committee Chair, are audit committee financial experts, as defined under SEC regulations.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: No member of the committee may receive any compensation, consulting, advisory or other fee from us, other than board compensation described below under the caption Director Compensation, as determined in accordance with applicable SEC and NYSE rules.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each Audit Committee member is limited to serving on the audit committees of two other public companies, unless the Board of Directors evaluates and determines that these other commitments would not impair the directors effective service to us.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A more detailed discussion of the committees mission, composition, and responsibilities is contained in the Audit Committee Charter.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A copy of this charter, which was last amended by the committee on November 29, 2016, can be found on our corporate governance website at http://www.teradata.com/audit-committee-charter.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A report of the Audit Committee is set forth below on page 77 of this proxy statement.

sentences.text: Compensation and Human Resource Committee:  In general, this committee
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (i) discharges our boards responsibilities relating to the compensation of our executives,
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ii) provides general oversight of our management compensation philosophy and practices, benefit programs, and strategic workforce initiatives,
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (iii) oversees succession planning and leadership development activities, and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (iv) reviews and approves our overall compensation principles, objectives and programs covering executive officers and key management employees as well as the competitiveness of our total executive officer compensation practices.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Compensation and Human Resource Committee also:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: evaluates and reviews the performance levels of our executive officers in light of the Companys goals and objectives and determines base salaries and equity and incentive awards for such officers;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: establishes the annual goals and objectives of the CEO, after consulting with the independent members of the board;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: at executive session of the Board of Directors, discusses its evaluation of, and determination of compensation for, the CEO based on the CEOs performance against annual goals and objectives;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: reviews and, as needed, recommends to our Board of Directors for approval our executive compensation plans, including incentive compensation plans, and all equity-based compensation plans;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: oversees our plans for management succession and development and, on an annual basis, assists the Board of Directors in reviewing and monitoring succession planning, particularly with respect to the CEO;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: reviews and discusses with management the disclosures in our proxy statements with respect to executive compensation policies and procedures and produces the committees annual report related to such disclosure for inclusion in our proxy statements;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: reviews managements proposals to make significant organizational changes or significant changes to existing executive officer compensation plans;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: reviews the stock ownership guidelines and compliance of the CEO and other executive officers with such guidelines;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: exercises administrative and oversight functions assigned to the committee under the Companys various benefi plans, including the Companys 401(k) savings plan;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: oversees the Teradata Benefits Committee to which it delegated oversight and management responsibilities for U.S.-based employee benefit plans;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: periodically reviews and monitors the Companys diversity and inclusion practices; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: reviews and makes recommendations to the board with respect to stockholder approval of executive compensation (say-on-pay votes) and the frequency of say-on-pay votes, including review of stockholder feedback as appropriate.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Compensation and Human Resource Committee has three members, Ms. Bacus and Messrs. Ringler and Schwarz, each of whom the Board of Directors has determined meets the NYSE listing independence standards and our ndependence standards.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The committee may form subcommittees with authority to act on the committees behalf as it deems appropriate and has delegated authority to our CEO and Chief Human Resource Officer to award equity to individuals other than executive officers in limited instances.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, the CEO conducts annual performance evaluations of executives and, after consulting with the Chief Human Resource Officer, provides this committee with his assessments and recommendations with respect to the amount and form of compensation for such executives.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In July 2016, this committee extended the engagement of Semler Brossy Consulting Group, LLC as its outside compensation consultant to assist the committee in the development of our executive compensation and benefit programs, including the amount and form of such compensation, and in the evaluation of our CEO.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The rules for the use of the compensation consultant by the committee and management include the following:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (i) only the committee and its Chair can hire or fire the consultant;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ii) on an annual basis, the consultant will provide the committee with a letter of the projected scope of services for the year;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (iii) the consultants work will be coordinated with our Chief Human Resource Officer and any project undertaken at managements request will be with the knowledge and consent of the committee Chair;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (iv) the consultant will have direct contact with the committee; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (v) the committee will evaluate the performance of the consultant on an annual basis.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In 2016, management did not engage the outside compensation consultant to perform any services for the Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Moreover, the Compensation and Human Resource Committee reviewed the independence of the consultant in light of SEC rules and NYSE listing standards regarding compensation consultants and has concluded that the firms work for the committee is independent and does not raise any conflicts of interest.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A more detailed discussion of the committees mission, composition, and responsibilities is contained in the Compensation and Human Resource Committee Charter, which was last amended on April 29, 2013, and is available on our corporate governance website at http://www.teradata.com/compensation-committee-charter.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: RELATED PERSON TRANSACTIONS
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Related Person Transactions Policy was adopted by the Board of Directors in 2007, and the board approved minor amendments to the policy in January 2013.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Under this policy, the boards Committee on Directors and Governance (the Governance Committee) is responsible for reviewing and approving each transaction in which Teradata was a participant involving or potentially involving an amount in excess of $120,000 and in which a related person had a material interest.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A related person is any director or executive officer, any immediate family member of a director or executive officer, a 5% or more stockholder, and any immediate family member of a 5% or more stockholder.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This policy provides for approval or ratification of each related person transaction in accordance with the procedures and policies discussed below
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (i) by our Governance Committee, or
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ii) if the Governance Committee determines that the approval or ratification of such related person transaction should be considered by all of the disinterested members of the Board of Directors, by a majority vote of the disinterested members of the board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The policy provides for our General Counsel to advise the Chair of the Governance Committee of any potential related person transaction involving in excess of $120,000 of which the General Counsel becomes aware, including managements assessment of whether the related persons interest in the potential related person transaction is material.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Governance Committee is required to consider such potential related person transaction, including whether the related persons interest in the potential related person transaction is material, unless the Governance Committee determines that the approval or ratification of such potential transaction should be considered by all of the disinterested members of the Board of Directors, in which case such disinterested members of the board will consider the potential transaction.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Except as set forth below, we will not enter into a related person transaction that is not approved in advance unless the consummation of such transaction is expressly subject to ratification.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If we enter into a transaction that we subsequently determine is a related person transaction or a transaction that was not a related person transaction at the time it was entered into but thereafter becomes a related person transaction, then in either such case the related person transaction must be presented to the Governance Committee or the disinterested members of the Board of Directors, as applicable, for ratification.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If the related person transaction is not ratified, then we are required to take all reasonable actions to attempt to terminate our participation in the transaction.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Factors that are reviewed by the Governance Committee or the Board of Directors, as applicable, when evaluating a potential related person transaction include:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (i) the size of the transaction and the amount payable to a related person;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ii) the nature of the interest of the related person in the transaction;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (iii) whether the transaction may involve a conflict of interest;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (iv) whether the transaction is fair to the Company;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (v) whether the transaction might impair independence of an outside director of the Company; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (vi) whether the transaction involves the provision of goods or services to us that are available from unaffiliated third parties and, if so, whether the transaction is on terms and made under circumstances that are at least as favorable to us as would be available in comparable transactions with or involving unaffiliated third parties.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: DIRECTOR COMPENSATION
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Teradatas Director Compensation Program is designed to enhance our ability to attract and retain highly qualified directors and to align their interests with the long-term interests of our stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The program consists of both a cash component, designed to compensate independent directors for their service on the board and its committees, and an equity component, designed to align the interests of independent directors and stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Lund has received no compensation for his service on the board since his appointment as an officer of the Company in May 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Annual Retainer
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Under the Director Compensation Program, for the 2016-2017 board year (the period between the Companys annual stockholders meetings), each non-employee member of Teradatas board receives an annual retainer of $50,000.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Chairman of the Board of Directors (Mr. Ringler) receives an additional retainer of $100,000, and each director serving on the Audit Committee receives an additional retainer of $5,000.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Chair of the Governance Committee receives an additional retainer of $10,000.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Chair of the Audit Committee receives an additional retainer of $20,000 and the Chair of the Compensation and Human Resource Committee receives an additional retainer of $15,000.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Prior to January 1 of each year, a director may elect to receive all or a portion of his or her annual retainer in Teradata common stock instead of cash.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, a director may elect to defer receipt of shares of common stock payable in lieu of cash.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Payments for deferred stock may be made only in shares of Teradata common stock.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Annual Equity Grant
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Director Compensation Program provides that, on the date of each annual meeting of stockholders, each non-employee director will be granted restricted share units (RSUs) and/or stock options to purchase a number of shares of Teradata common stock in an amount determined by the Governance Committee and approved by the board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For the 2016- 2017 board year, each of the non-employee directors received an annual equity grant consisting of RSUs with a total dollar value of $250,000.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The RSUs vest in four equal quarterly installments commencing three months after the grant date, and directors may elect to defer receipt of the shares of common stock payable when the RSUs vest.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Initial Equity Grant
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Director Compensation Program also provides that upon initial election to the board, each non-employee director will receive a grant of RSUs.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A director may elect to defer receipt of the shares of common stock that would otherwise be received upon vesting of RSUs.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The RSUs vest in four equal quarterly installments commencing three months after the grant date.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Payment is made only in Teradata common stock.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: No director received an initial equity grant during 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mid-Year Equity Grant
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Under the Director Compensation Program, the board has the discretion, based on the recommendation of the Governance Committee, to grant mid-year equity grants in the form of stock
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: options and/or awards of restricted shares or RSUs to directors who are newly elected to the board after the annual meeting of stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If a mid-year equity grant is made in the form of RSUs, a director may elect to defer receipt of the shares of common stock that would otherwise be received upon vesting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Option grants made in connection with a mid-year equity grant will be fully vested and exercisable on the first anniversary of the grant.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Restricted share unit grants made in connection with a mid-year equity grant vest in four equal quarterly installments commencing three months after the grant date.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Payment is made only in Teradata common stock.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: No director received a mid-year equity grant during 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN
