sentences.text: POTENTIAL PAYMENTS UPON TERMINATION OR CHANGE IN CONTROL
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Background
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We have entered into agreements and maintain plans and arrangements that may require us to pay or provide compensation and benefits to our named executive officers in the event of certain terminations of employment or a change in control.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For example, all of our current named executive officers other than Mr. Lund are participants in our CIC Plan, which provides double-trigger severance protections in the event that a participating executives employment is terminated under qualifying circumstances in connection with a change in control.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Estimates of the amounts to be paid or provided to each of our current named executive officers in connection with a termination of employment or a change in control are provided below.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The benefits actually payable to our former named executive officers (Messrs. Koehler, Fair and Morton) as a result of the termination of their employment in 2016 are also described below.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Estimated Payments to Current Named Executive Officers
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The estimates set forth below of the amounts payable to our current named executive officers upon termination of employment or in connection with a change in control are based on the assumption that the various triggering events occurred on the last day of 2016, along with other material assumptions noted below.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The actual amounts that would be paid to a named executive officer upon termination or a change in control can only be determined at the time the actual triggering event occurs.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The estimated amount of compensation and benefits described below for our current named executive officers does not take into account compensation and benefits that were already earned at the time of the applicable triggering event, such as equity awards that have previously vested in accordance with their terms or vested benefits otherwise payable under our compensation programs.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As a result, the estimates below for our current named executive officers do not provide information on the payout of 2016 incentive awards under our annual bonus programs, because those awards were earned as of December 31, 2016, subject to Committee approval, regardless of whether the executive terminated employment or a change in control occurred on that date.

sentences.text: Change in Control Severance Plan
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We maintain the CIC Plan to help retain key executives by reducing personal uncertainty that may arise from the possibility of a change in control and to promote their objectivity and neutrality in evaluating transactions that may be in the best interest of the Company and its stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This plan establishes objective criteria to determine whether a change in control has occurred, and provides for severance payments and benefits on a double trigger basis (including vesting of equity awards that are assumed in a change in control transaction, other than non-employee director restricted share units
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: held by Mr. Lund, which, by their terms, vest on a single-trigger basis on the occurrence of a change in control).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The double trigger design is intended to further our goals to retain key executives upon a change in control.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each current named executive officer  other than Mr. Lund  participates in the CIC Plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In the event of an nvoluntary termination of his employment in connection with a reduction-in-force, Mr. Lund would be eligible to receive severance benefits under our reduction in force programs that are generally available to the Companys salaried, U.S.-based employees.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Under the CIC Plan, if a participating executives employment is terminated by us other than for cause, death or disability or if the executive resigns for good reason within two years after a change in control (or within six months prior to a change in control, if the executive can demonstrate that the termination occurred in connection with a change in control), then Teradata or its successor will be obligated to pay or provide the following benefits:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A lump sum payment equal to 2.0 times (for Messrs. Scheppmann and Harrington) or 1.0 times (for Messrs. Ratzesberger and Dinning) the executives annual base salary and annual incentive.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For this purpose, annua incentive generally means the average annual incentive earned for the prior three years;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A lump sum payment equal to a pro-rata portion of the average annual incentive earned for the prior three years;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Continued medical, dental and life insurance coverage for two years (for Messrs. Scheppmann and Harrington) or one year (for Messrs. Ratzesberger and Dinning); and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Continued outplacement and financial counseling services, if such services are offered at such time, for one year.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The CIC Plan provides that upon termination of employment, each participant is prohibited from soliciting our employees for a one-year period and is subject to confidentiality restrictions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Moreover, each participant is required to sign a release of all claims against the Company prior to receiving severance benefits under the plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The CIC Plan does not provide for any gross-up payments related to excise taxes that may be imposed on an executive in connection with a change in control.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For purposes of the plan, the term cause generally means the willful and continued failure to perform assigned duties or the willful engaging in illegal or gross misconduct that materially injures the Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The term good reason generally means
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (i) the assignment of duties inconsistent with the executives position, authority, duties or responsibilities as in effect prior to a change in control;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ii) a reduction in base salary;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (iii) failure to pay incentive compensation when due;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (iv) a reduction in target or maximum incentive opportunities;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (v) a failure to continue the equity compensation plan or other employee benefit programs;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (vi) a relocation of the executives office by more than forty miles (provided that it also increases the executives commute by more than 20 miles); or
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (vii) failure to require a successor to assume the plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The term change in control generally means any of the following:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (i) an acquisition of 50% or more of our stock by any person or group, other than the Company, our subsidiaries or employee benefit plans;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ii) a change in the membership of our Board of Directors, such that the current incumbents and their approved successors no longer constitute a majority;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (iii) a reorganization, merger, consolidation or sale or other disposition of substantially all of our assets in which any one of the following is true  our old stockholders do not hold at least 50% of the combined enterprise, there is a 50%-or-more stockholder of the combined enterprise (other than as a result of conversion of the
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: stockholders pre-combination interest in the Company), or the members of our Board of Directors (immediately before the combination) do not make up a majority of the board of the combined enterprise; or (iv) stockholder approval of a complete liquidation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Treatment of Equity Awards
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As described above, the CIC Plan generally provides for double trigger vesting of employee equity awards in connection with a change in control, meaning that, if the awards are assumed by the surviving entity in the change of control, vesting of the awards will not accelerate unless the executive also has a qualifying termination of employment (by the Company without cause or by the executive for good reason).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In contrast, if the surviving entity does not assume the equity awards upon the change in control, unvested awards will become vested upon the occurrence of the change in control.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The treatment of our employee equity awards in connection with a change of control is summarized in the chart below.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As noted above, while he was a non-employee member of Teradatas Board of Directors, Mr. Lund participated in our compensation program for non-employee directors, including receiving equity awards in the form of restricted share units that generally vest in four installments on a quarterly basis over the one-year period after the date of grant, which awards would become vested in full on a single-trigger basis upon the occurrence of a change in control prior to a quarterly vesting date.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Change in Control (CIC)
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 1-Year Performance Period PBRSUs
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If the award is not assumed by the surviving entity, then the award wi vest in full, either at the target level, if the CIC occurs during the performance period, or based on actual performance, if the CIC occurs after the end of the performance period and prior to payment.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If the award is assumed, then, subject to the executives continued employment (except for Mr. Lund, whose PBRSUs will be fully vested based on service through December 31 of the applicable1- year performance period), the award will continue to vest, either at the target level, if the CIC occurs during the performance period, or based on actual performance, if the CIC occurs after the end of the performance period and prior to payment.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: However, vesting of the award will be accelerated if the executives employment is terminated without cause, terminated on account of death, disability, retirement or reduction in force, or the executive terminates his employment for good reason, within twenty-four months after the CIC.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If the award is assumed, then, subject to the executives continued employment (except for Mr. Lund, whose PBRSUs will be fully vested based on service through December 31 of the first year of the applicable 3-year performance period), the award will continue to vest, either at the target level, if the CIC occurs during the first year of the performance period, or based on actual performance up to the date of the CIC, if the CIC occurs during the second or third year of the performance period.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: However, vesting of the award will be accelerated if the executives employment is terminated without cause, terminated on account of death, disability, retirement or reduction in force, or the executive terminates his employment for good reason, within twenty-four months after the CIC.

sentences.text: ADVISORY (NON-BINDING) VOTE ON EXECUTIVE COMPENSATION (Item 2 on Proxy Card)
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The foundation of our executive compensation program is to pay for performance.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our executive officers are compensated based on the key financial and strategic drivers of our business and in a manner that is consistent with competitive practices and sound corporate governance principles.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We believe that our executive compensation program aligns our incentive compensation with the long-term interests of our stockholders because it is designed to motivate our executives to deliver long-term sustainable growth and stockholder value, and to provide retention incentives.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The board encourages you to review the Executive Compensation section of this proxy statement, including the Compensation Discussion and Analysis and related tables and narratives, beginning on page 33 of this proxy statement, for additional details on our executive compensation program.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As required by the Dodd-Frank Wall Street Reform and Consumer Protection Act, stockholders are able to vote to approve, on an advisory (non-binding) basis no less than once every three years, the compensation of our named executive officers (a say-on-pay vote).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Since our annual meeting of stockholders in 2011, we have provided our stockholders with annual say-on-pay voting opportunities.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In connection with our 2016 annual meeting, our advisory say-on-pay proposal was approved by approximately 87.1% of the votes cast at the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Since 2015, our Board of Directors has regularly engaged stockholders to solicit their input regarding the Companys executive compensation program.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This past year, we again sought feedback from our largest 25 institutional investors, representing approximately 72% of Teradatas outstanding shares.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Discussions with investors who responded to our outreach efforts (and others who reached out to us) touched on a number of themes including stockholders desire that a meaningful portion of long-term incentive value be allocated to performance-based equity awards for a strong rationale and linkage between applicable performance goals and the Companys business strategy.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The changes to our executive compensation that were approved in 2016, as described below, were consistent with the common themes expressed by our stockholders and generally have been viewed very favorably by investors because they reinforce the performance-oriented structure of our program:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 1. We increased the percentage of the long-term incentive opportunity allocated to performance-based equity awards from 50% to 100% because we believe that an all-performance plan will deliver better results.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 2. We eliminated service-based restricted share units and stock options.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 3. We increased the weighting of performance-based equity awards based on relative total shareholder return over a 3-year performance period (2017-2019) from 25% to approximately 37%.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 4. We added achievement of important business transformation financial and operational measures as key performance metrics for approximately 63% of the performance-based equity awards.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We are now providing our stockholders with the opportunity to cast non-binding advisory votes to approve the compensation of our named executive officers for 2016, and are asking stockholders to vote to adopt the following resolution:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: RESOLVED, that the stockholders of Teradata Corporation approve, on an advisory basis, the compensation of the Companys named executive officers, as such compensation is described in the Compensation Discussion and Analysis section, the tabular disclosure regarding such compensation, and the accompanying narrative disclosure and related material, set forth in the Companys definitive proxy statement for the 2017 annual meeting of stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This say-on-pay proposal vote is intended to provide an overall assessment of our executive compensation program rather than focus on any specific item of compensation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As an advisory vote, this proposal is non-binding.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: However, the board and our Compensation and Human Resource Committee, which is responsible for designing and overseeing the administration of our executive compensation program, values the opinions of our stockholders and will consider the outcome of the vote when making future compensation decisions for our named executive officers.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board of Directors recommends that you vote FOR this proposal.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Proxies will be so voted unless stockholders specify otherwise in their proxies.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Approval of this resolution requires the affirmative vote of a majority of the voting power present (in person or by proxy) at the meeting and entitled to vote on this item of business.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: However, the results of this vote are not binding on the board, whether or not any resolution is passed under this voting standard.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To the extent there is any significant vote against our executive compensation program, the Compensation and Human Resource Committee will evaluate whether any actions are necessary and appropriate to address stockholder concerns.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: ADVISORY (NON-BINDING) VOTE ON FREQUENCY OF SAY-ON-PAY VOTE (Item 3 on Proxy Card)
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Under SEC rules in connection with the say-on-pay vote described in Proposal 2 above, we are required to solicit stockholder votes on the frequency of future say-on-pay proposals at least once every six years.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In 2011, our stockholders were given an opportunity to cast an advisory, non-binding vote on the frequency of future say-on-pay votes conducted by the Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: At that meeting, the most votes were cast for the frequency period of every one year and the Company has since provided stockholders with an opportunity to approve its executive compensation on an annual basis.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We are now providing our stockholders with the opportunity to cast non-binding advisory votes to approve the frequency of future say-on-pay votes.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board of Directors continues to feel that annual say-on-pay votes are an appropriate means to obtain stockholders views on the Companys executive compensation program for consideration in making decisions with respect to such program.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Therefore, the board is recommending that we continue the practice of annual say-on-pay votes.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board of Directors recommends that you vote FOR the option of once every year as the preferred frequency for advisory say-on-pay votes on executive compensation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Proxies will be so voted unless stockholders specify otherwise in their proxies.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Approval of this resolution requires the affirmative vote of a majority of the voting power present (in person or by proxy) at the meeting and entitled to vote on this item of business.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: However, the results of this vote are not binding on the board, whether or not this item is passed under this voting standard.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In evaluating the vote on this advisory resolution, the board will consider the voting results in their entirety.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: DIRECTORS PROPOSAL TO RATIFY THE APPOINTMENT OF INDEPENDENT REGISTERED PUBLIC ACCOUNTING FIRM FOR 2017 (Item 4 on Proxy Card)
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee of the Board of Directors, which is composed entirely of independent directors, appointed PricewaterhouseCoopers (PwC) as our independent registered public accounting firm for 2017 to audit our consolidated financial statements.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The board has approved this appointment and, as a matter of good corporate governance, is asking you to ratify this appointment.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In determining whether to reappoint PwC as our independent auditor, the Audit Committee considers, among other things, the length of time PwC has been engaged, in addition to considering the quality of the discussions with the ndependent auditor and an assessment of past performance of PwC.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee annually reviews PwCs ndependence and performance in deciding whether to retain PwC or engage another firm as our independent registered public accounting firm.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In the course of these reviews, the Audit Committee considers, among other things:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: PwCs historical and recent performance on the Teradata audit;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: PwCs capability and expertise in handling the breadth and complexity of our worldwide operations;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The appropriateness of PwCs fees for audit and non-audit services;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: PwCs independence;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The potential impact of changing auditors; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: PwCs tenure as our independent auditor, including the benefits of having a long-tenured auditor and controls and processes that help ensure PwCs independence.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Based on its Pre-Approval Policy (as defined on page 78 of this proxy statement) and applicable SEC rules and guidance, the Audit Committee has considered whether the provision of the tax and other non-audit services described below under the caption Fees Paid to Independent Registered Public Accounting Firm was compatible with maintaining PwCs independence and concluded that it was.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Based on its review of the above factors, the Audit Committee believes that it is in the best interests of Teradata and our stockholders to retain PwC as our independent registered public accounting firm for 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: PwC has been our independent registered public accounting firm since 2007.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The firm is considered a leader in providing audit services to the high-technology industry.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The board believes that PwC is well-qualified to serve as our independent registered public accounting firm given its experience, global presence with offices or affiliates in or near most locations where we do business, and quality audit work in serving us.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: PwC rotates its audit partners assigned to audit us at least once every five years in accordance with SEC rules, and the Audit Committee oversees the selection of PwCs lead engagement partner.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, the Audit Committee has placed restrictions on our ability to hire any employees or former employees of PwC or its affiliates.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Representatives of PwC will be at the annual meeting to answer questions, and they may also make any statement they wish at the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board of Directors recommends that you vote FOR this proposa
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Approval of this proposal requires the affirmative vote of a majority of the voting power present (in person or by proxy) a he meeting and entitled to vote on this item of business.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If the stockholders do not approve this proposal, the Audit Committee and the Board of Directors will reconsider the appointment, but may decide to maintain its appointment of PwC.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Proxies solicited by the board will be voted FOR this proposal, unless you specify otherwise in your proxy.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: BOARD AUDIT COMMITTEE REPORT
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Companys management is responsible for the preparation, presentation and integrity of the Companys financial statements, accounting and financial reporting principles, internal controls, and procedures designed to ensure compliance with accounting standards, applicable laws, and regulations.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: PricewaterhouseCoopers LLP (PwC), the Companys independent registered public accounting firm, is responsible for performing an independent audit of the Companys consolidated financial statements and expressing an opinion on the conformity of those financial statements with generally accepted accounting principles.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A more detailed discussion of the factors considered by the Audit Committee in appointing PwC as Teradatas independent auditor is found on page 76 of this proxy statement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In the course of fulfilling its oversight responsibilities for the Company, the Audit Committee has reviewed and discussed with management the Companys audited financial statements for fiscal year 2016, as well as quarterly earnings releases and quarterly reports on Form 10-Q, and, together with the Board of Directors, has reviewed and discussed the Companys annual report on Form 10-K for the fiscal year ended December 31, 2016 and this proxy statement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, as part of their oversight responsibility, the Audit Committee members have reviewed and discussed with management the adequacy and effectiveness of the Companys internal control over financial reporting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: PwC has also discussed with the Audit Committee significant matters regarding internal control over financial reporting that have come to its attention during the course of its audit of the consolidated financial statements.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee also discussed with the Companys management the process used for certifications by the Companys Chief Executive and Chief Financial Officers for the Companys quarterly and year-end filings with the SEC, as well as the clarity and completeness of the Companys financial disclosures.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Further, the Audit Committee discussed with PwC the matters required to be discussed under the Public Company Accounting Oversight Board (PCAOB), Auditing Standard No. 16 (Communications with Audit Committees).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: These matters include:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (i) the overall scope and plans for PwCs independent audit as well as approval of the terms of PwCs engagement letter;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ii) review of Teradatas internal audit plan;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (iii) review of PwCs audit strategy and approach, including accounting policies, practices and estimates; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (iv) PwCs evaluation of our financial reporting and other key findings related to the audit.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee also has received the written disclosures and the letter from PwC required by the applicable requirements of the PCAOB regarding PwCs communications with the Audit Committee concerning independence and has discussed with PwC its independence from management and the Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Pages 20 to 21 of this proxy statement contain a detailed listing of the Audit Committees areas of responsibility.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee met in executive session periodically in 2016 with PwC, the Companys Chief Financial Officer, and Vice President of Enterprise Risk and Assurance Services, each of whom has unrestricted access to the committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Based on the reviews and the discussions referred to above, the Audit Committee recommended to the Board of Directors that the Companys audited consolidated financial statements be included in the Companys Annual Report on Form 10-K for the fiscal year ended December 31, 2016 for filing with the Securities and Exchange Commission.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Dated: February 22, 2017
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: FEES PAID TO INDEPENDENT REGISTERED PUBLIC ACCOUNTING FIRM
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The following table presents the fees accrued or billed for professional audit services rendered by our independent registered public accounting firm, PricewaterhouseCoopers LLP (PwC), for the audit of our consolidated financial statements for fiscal years 2016 and 2015, as well as the worldwide fees accrued or billed for other services rendered by PwC in 2016 and 2015.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Includes fees related to the annual audit and quarterly review of our consolidated financial statements, the audit of internal control over financial reporting, attestation services and review services associated with our filings with the SEC, and consultations with management as to the accounting or disclosure treatment of transactions or events and the actual or potential impact of final or proposed rules, standards or interpretations by regulatory and standard setting bodies (consultation services).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Also includes $154,289 for the 2015 statutory audits of the financial statements of select foreign subsidiaries.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Includes tax fees for tax compliance services related to our subsidiaries in Mexico.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Includes license fees for PwC software products used to assist in conducting accounting research and other service tools.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee has adopted policies and procedures regarding its pre-approval of the audit, audit-related, tax and all other non-audit services to be provided by our independent registered public accounting firm or its affiliates to us or our consolidated subsidiaries (the Pre-Approval Policy).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This policy is designed to assure that the provision of such services does not impair the independence of our independent registered public accounting firm.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Under the Pre-Approval Policy, at the beginning of each fiscal year, the Audit Committee will review the services proposed by management and our independent registered public accounting firm to be provided during that year.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee will then provide its pre-approval based on the limitations set forth in the Pre-Approval Policy.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: These limitations include the following:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In no case should we or any of our consolidated subsidiaries retain our independent registered public accounting firm or its affiliates to provide management consulting services or any non-audit services that are not permitted under applicable laws and regulations, including, without limitation, the Sarbanes-Oxley Act of 2002 and the SECs related rules and regulations.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Unless a type of service to be provided by the independent registered public accounting firm has received general pre-approval, it will require specific pre-approval by the Audit Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Any other non-audit services and tax consulting services will require specific pre-approvals by the Audit Committee and a determination that such services would not impair the independence of our independent registered public accounting firm.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Specific pre-approvals by the Audit Committee will also be required for any material changes or additions to the pre-approved services.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee recommends that the ratio of total tax and all other non-audit services to total audit and audit- related services procured by us in a fiscal year be less than one-to-one.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee will not permit the exclusive retention of our independent registered public accounting firm in connection with a transaction initially recommended by the independent registered public accounting firm, the purpose of which may be tax avoidance and the tax treatment of which is not supported in applicable tax law.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Pre-approval fee levels for all services to be provided by the independent registered public accounting firm will be established annually by the Audit Committee, and updated on a quarterly basis by the Audit Committee at its regularly scheduled meetings.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Any proposed services significantly exceeding these levels will require separate pre-approval by the Audit Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Chief Accounting Officer will report to the Audit Committee on a quarterly basis regarding the status of all pre-approved audit, audit-related, tax and all other non-audit services provided by our independent registered public accounting firm or its affiliates to us or our consolidated subsidiaries.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Back-up documentation will be provided as appropriate to the Audit Committee by management and/or the independent registered public accounting firm when requesting pre-approval of services by our independent registered public accounting firm.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: At the request of the Audit Committee, additional detailed documentation regarding the specific services will be provided.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Requests or applications to provide services that require separate approval by the Audit Committee will be submitted to the Audit Committee by our Chief Financial Officer, with the support of the independent registered public accounting firm, and must include a joint statement as to whether, in the view of management and the independent registered public accounting firm, the request or application is consistent with the SECs rules on auditor independence.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Under the Pre-Approval Policy, the Audit Committee has delegated to its Chair limited authority to grant pre-approvals for audit, audit-related, tax and other non-audit services in the event that immediate approval of a service is needed.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Chair shall report any pre-approval decisions to the Audit Committee at its next scheduled meeting for its review and approval.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee has not delegated to management its responsibilities to pre-approve services performed by the independent registered public accounting firm.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The audit, tax and all other non-audit services provided by PwC to us, and the fees charged for such services, will be actively monitored by the Audit Committee as set forth in the Pre-Approval Policy on a quarterly basis to maintain the appropriate level of objectivity and independence in the firms audit work for us.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Part of the Audit Committees ongoing monitoring includes a review of any de minimis exceptions as provided in the applicable SEC rules for non-audit services tha were not pre-approved by the Audit Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All services provided by PwC in the fiscal years 2016 and 2015 were pre-approved by the Audit Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: HOUSEHOLDING OF PROXY MATERIALS
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The SEC has adopted rules that permit companies and intermediaries (e.g., banks and brokers) to satisfy the delivery requirements for annual reports, proxy statements, and Notice of Internet Availability of Proxy Materials (Notice) with respect to two or more stockholders sharing the same address by delivering one annual report, proxy statement and Notice addressed to those stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This process, which is commonly referred to as householding, potentially means extra convenience for stockholders and cost savings for companies.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A number of brokers with account holders who are Teradatas stockholders will be householding our proxy materials.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A single annual report, proxy statement and Notice will be delivered to multiple stockholders sharing an address unless contrary instructions have been received from the affected stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you have multiple Teradata common stock record accounts and/or share an address with a family member who is a Teradata stockholder and want to receive more than one copy of the annual report, proxy statement or Notice, you may contact our mailing agent, Broadridge Financial Solutions, at Broadridge Householding Department, 51 Mercedes Way, Edgewood, New York, 11717 (phone: 1-800-542-1061).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Broadridge will remove you from the householding program within thirty days after receipt of this request and will mail you a separate copy of the annual report, proxy statement, and Notice.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Stockholders who hold their stock through a bank or broker and currently receive multiple copies of the annual report, proxy statement or Notice at their address and would like to request householding of their communications should contact their bank or broker.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We will pay the expenses of soliciting proxies in connection with the annual meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Proxies may be solicited on our behalf through the mail, in person, by telephone, electronic transmission, or facsimile transmission.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We have hired Okapi Partners LLC to assist in the solicitation of proxies, at an estimated cost of $12,000 plus reimbursement of reasonable out-of-pocket expenses.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In accordance with SEC and NYSE rules, we will also reimburse brokerage houses and other custodians, nominees and fiduciaries for their expenses of sending proxies and proxy materials as intermediaries to the beneficial owners of our common stock.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Procedures for Stockholder Proposals and Nominations
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Under our bylaws, nominations for directors at an annual meeting may be made only by
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (i) the Board of Directors or a committee of the board, or
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ii) a stockholder entitled to vote who has delivered notice to us within 90 to 120 days before the first anniversary of the date of the preceding years annual meeting and complied with the additional requirements set forth in our bylaws.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our bylaws also provide that business may not be brought before an annual meeting unless it is
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (i) specified in our proxy materials (i.e., proposals brought by the Board of Directors and stockholder proposals that we are required to include in our proxy statement under SEC Rule 14a-8),
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ii) brought before the meeting by or at the direction of the board, or
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (iii) brought by a stockholder entitled to vote who has delivered notice to us (containing certain information specified in the bylaws) within 90 to 120 days before the first anniversary of the date of the preceding years annual meeting and complied with the additional requirements set forth in our bylaws.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In order to include a proposal in our notice of meeting and proxy materials pursuant to SEC Rule 14a-8, you must comply with the requirements of that rule.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A copy of the full text of our bylaws may be obtained upon written request to the Corporate Secretary at Teradata Corporation, 10000 Innovation Drive, Dayton, Ohio 45342.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A copy of our bylaws, which were last amended by the Board of Directors on July 26, 2016, is also available on our corporate governance website at http://www.teradata.com/articles-and-bylaws.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Stockholder Proposals for 2018 Annual Meeting
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To include a stockholder proposal in our 2018 notice of meeting and proxy materials pursuant to SEC Rule 14a-8, a stockholder must satisfy all applicable requirements of that rule, and the proposal must be received by our Corporate Secretary at Teradata Corporation, 10000 Innovation Drive, Dayton, Ohio 45342, no later than November 1, 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To present any other proposal at the 2018 annual meeting of stockholders, or to nominate a candidate for director election at the 2018 annual meeting, a stockholder must submit an advance written notice of such proposal and/or nomination (as applicable) to us that complies with certain requirements set forth in our bylaws.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Such advance written notice must be received by our Corporate Secretary at the Companys address provided on page 1 of this proxy statement no sooner than the close of business on December 18, 2017, and no later than the close of business on January 17, 2018.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN
